bio.title: Bio
bio.content: Brazilian Computer Science student with a strong foundation in programming and years of practical experience. My work revolves around creating impactful solutions to improve daily lives and foster connections between people.

main_projects.title: Main Projects
main_projects.content: I have spearheaded innovative projects like HobbyFriends, a platform designed to reduce social isolation by connecting individuals with shared interests. This initiative helps people build meaningful relationships within their local communities. Another significant achievement is E-Gab, a transparency-driven platform that bridges the gap between politicians and voters, encouraging accountability and better communication in the political sphere.

idioms.title: Idioms
idioms.content: Portuguese is my native language. I'm also confident in English and Spanish, and have some knowledge of Japanese, which I'm still refining.

reading_list.title: Reading List
reading_list.content:
I do a lot of reading, and when I find books that are particularly good, I write them down so I can recommend them to others. This reading list is made up of my current favorite books and are organized by category. I consider these books “must-read” for their category as they will help you learn and grow in your career.

Note: This page contains affiliate links. If you click through and purchase a book, I may receive compensation for that purchase.
